alert.note: Alert for Inyo (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 28 at 11:50AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast California, including the following county, Inyo. * WHEN...Until 700 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1150 AM PST, Flooding remains ongoing near Highway 395 and Cactus Flats with minor flooding reported earlier and snow melt continuing. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Olancha, Cartago and Keeler. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
